summary: Premium, high‑end website plan for Joe Snuffy’s Old Fashioned Grill featuring restrained typography, warm color palette, subtle motion, and conversion‑focused sections. The design uses two carefully chosen web fonts, a clear typographic scale, and modern CSS patterns to deliver a polished, fast, and accessible experience.

sections.name: Hero
sections.description: Full‑width, cinematic background with a headline, sub‑headline, and primary CTA to reserve. Subtle parallax and fade‑in motion.

sections.name: Trust Proof
sections.description: Awards, local press logos, and 5‑star review snippets displayed in a horizontal carousel with micro‑hover lift.

sections.name: Featured Offerings
sections.description: Three‑column card grid showcasing signature dishes with glassmorphic overlays and hover‑scale.

sections.name: Chef Spotlight
sections.description: Portrait with animated text reveal, background gradient, and a short video clip of cooking.

sections.name: Testimonials
sections.description: Vertical carousel of customer quotes with subtle slide‑in animation and star rating icons.

sections.name: Conversion CTA
sections.description: Sticky reservation form with auto‑focus fields, inline validation, and a subtle progress bar.

sections.name: Footer
sections.description: Contact info, social links, quick navigation, and a newsletter sign‑up with micro‑interaction.

sections.name: Menu Overview
sections.description: Tab‑based layout for Breakfast, Lunch, and Specials with collapsible sections.

sections.name: Dish Detail
sections.description: Hover card with ingredient list, nutritional info, and a subtle 3D tilt.

sections.name: Reservation Form
sections.description: Step‑by‑step wizard with calendar picker, time slots, and confirmation modal.

sections.name: Our Story
sections.description: Timeline with parallax images, text blocks, and a micro‑animation for each milestone.

style_notes: Fonts: Display – Playfair Display (serif, weight 700), Body – Inter (sans‑serif, weight 400). Typographic scale (6 steps): H1 – 96 px, H2 – 72 px, H3 – 48 px, H4 – 32 px, Body – 18 px, Caption – 14 px. Color story: #1C1C1C (charcoal), #D4A63F (warm amber), #F5F5F5 (neutral off‑white). Contrast: minimum 4.5:1 for body, 7:1 for headings. Spacing rhythm: base 8 px grid, use multiples (8, 16, 24, 32). Motion style: 200 ms ease‑in‑out for hover lifts, 400 ms for scroll‑triggered fades, micro‑animations only on interactive elements.
assets_needed: Chef portrait and short video clip
Micro‑interaction animation assets (SVGs for hover effects)
